Hero.name: Emre Kurt
Hero.title: Frontend-focused Full Stack Developer
Hero.description: I craft scalable, maintainable, and user-centric web applications using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Vue. Passionate about clean code, performance, and intuitive design.

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
AboutPage.description: Innovative and user-focused Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of professional experience building scalable and maintainable web applications. My main focus is on frontend development using modern frameworks like React and Vue.js, with strong expertise in TypeScript, component-based architecture, and UI performance optimization.

workExperiences.description: Architected and developed modern web applications utilizing React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, Stencil.js. Built reusable components, optimized performance with useMemo and useCallback, integrated backend APIs with Django and Symfony, and implemented automated tests using Playwright.

Executed full-stack development using React (TypeScript) and Node.js. Managed MySQL databases with Prisma ORM, developed frontend UI with hooks and functional components, and automated E2E tests with Cypress.
Developed dynamic web and mobile applications using React, React Native, Node.js, Django. Applied Scrum methodology and collaborated in agile teams.

certifications: Docker from A to Z – Udemy
Agile Software Development – University of Minnesota

skills.testing: Cypress, Playwright, Jest, Vitest, React Testing Library
skills.tools: Docker, Git, CI/CD (GitHub Actions), Jira, Agile/Scrum
